name: NSCell.StyleMask
desc: Constants for specifying what happens when a button is pressed or is displaying its alternate state.

items.name: static var pushInCellMask: NSCell.StyleMask
items.desc: The button cell “pushes in” if it has a border.

items.name: static var contentsCellMask: NSCell.StyleMask
items.desc: The button cell displays its alternate icon and/or title.

items.name: static var changeGrayCellMask: NSCell.StyleMask
items.desc: The button cell swaps the “control color” (the controlColor method of NSColor) and white pixels on its background and icon.

items.name: static var changeBackgroundCellMask: NSCell.StyleMask
items.desc: Same as NSChangeGrayCellMask, but only background pixels are changed.
